title: Can I point out a slight change to Jhin to make it have more sense
body: Just a small change im asking really. But, when you land the snare from Jhin's W ability and you gain your passive movement speed. Since it is a QUITE long skillshot, shouldn't you gain like 2x the speed from passive. It would make more sense since why would you need the movement speed from it if you're literally not even that close to make the snare useful.
